title: Construction of a Two Storied Building for the Faculty of Humanities, University of Kelaniya (Stage III of Building K 20)
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education for the construction of a two storeyed building for the  Faculty of Humanities, University of Kelaniya at a total cost of Rs.35 million utilizing the funds generated by the University of Kelaniya and to award the construction works to the State Engineering Corporation, subject to completion of the construction work within the stipulated time frame, was approved by the Cabinet.
